author: martinc
msg: Generate the 'tabindex' attribute, if it was specified.
Submitted by: Edwin van Nuil. Patch supplied by Antoni Reus - thanks!

author: martinc
msg: Correct exception message for required parameters to SwitchAction.
Submitted by: Eddie Bush - Thanks for the patch!

author: martinc
msg: Don't call release() at the end of doEndTag(), so that attribute values
are retained for tag handler reuse. This fixes a bug which caused a
second identical invocation of the tag to fail when the container chose
not to set the attribute the second time (which is valid).

author: jholmes
msg: update <data-source> config documentation to have an example for Commons BasicDataSource
